attributes.action: Resign his position as Prime Minister, within one month.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For years Tony Blair has said he will leave, there have been so called 'infuriated politions', at his unwillingnes to leave office but he will still not resign.  I propose that within one month he leave office to more competant, liked and frankly serious poilitions.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
